type=\"text/javascript\"></script>\n<script src=\"/ja/js/jquery.ah-placeholder.js\" type=\"text/javascript\" defer=\"\"></script>\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\ngoogle.load('search', '1', {language : 'ja', style : google.loader.themes.MINIMALIST});\ngoogle.setOnLoadCallback(function()\n{\n  var customSearchOptions = {};\n  var orderByOptions = {};\n  orderByOptions['keys'] = [{label: '関連性', key: ''},{label: '日付', key: 'date'}];\n  customSearchOptions['enableOrderBy'] = true;\n  customSearchOptions['orderByOptions'] = orderByOptions;\n  var googleAnalyticsOptions = {};\n  googleAnalyticsOptions['queryParameter'] = 'q';\n  googleAnalyticsOptions['categoryParameter'] = '';\n  customSearchOptions['googleAnalyticsOptions'] = googleAnalyticsOptions;\n  customSearchOptions['adoptions'] = {'layout': 'noTop'};\n  var customSearchControl = new google.search.CustomSearchControl('011042576841096630272:qhhorkqb6ac', customSearchOptions);\n  customSearchControl.setResultSetSize(google.search.Search.FILTERED_CSE_RESULTSET);\n  var options = new google.search.DrawOptions();\n  options.setSearchFormRoot('cse-search-form');\n  options.setAutoComplete(true);\n\n  if(typeof(search_result) != \"undefined\" && search_result == true)\n  {\n    customSearchControl.draw('cse', options);\n    var queryFromUrl = parseQueryFromUrl();\n    if( queryFromUrl )\n    {\n      customSearchControl.execute( queryFromUrl );\n    }\n  }else{\n    options.enableSearchboxOnly(\"/ja/search\",\"q\");\n    customSearchControl.draw('cse', options);\n  }\n\n  $(\"#cse-search-form td.gsc-input\").removeAttr(\"style\");\n  $(\"#cse-search-form td.gsc-input input\").removeAttr(\"style\");\n  $(\"#cse-search-form td.gsc-search-button input\").attr(\"value\", \"SEARCH\");\n  $(\"#cse-search-form td.gsc-input input\").attr(\"placeholder\", \"TYPE TO SEARCH\");\n\n  $(\"#cse-search-form td.gsc-search-button input\").removeAttr(\"class\");\n  $(\"#cse-search-form .gsc-search-button\").on('click', function(){\n    $('.search_keyword').css({'display': 'none'});\n    $('.search_keyword').removeClass('open');\n    $('.search_keyword').attr('value', '');\n  });\n\n  $(\".gsc-orderby-label\").empty().append(\"並び替え &gt; \").css({fontSize:\"12px\"});\n\n  $(\"#cse-search-form td.gsc-input input\").ahPlaceholder({\n    placeholderColor : 'silver',\n    placeholderAttr  : 'placeholder',\n    likeApple        : true\n  });\n\n}, true);\n\n// URLから検索クエリを取得する\nfunction parseQueryFromUrl ()\n{\n  var queryParamName = 'q';\n  var search = window.location.search.substr( 1 );\n  var parts = search.split( '&' );\n\n  for( var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++ )\n  {\n    var keyvaluepair = parts[ i ].split( '=' );\n    if( decodeURIComponent( keyvaluepair[ 0 ] ) == queryParamName )\n    {\n      return decodeURIComponent( keyvaluepair[ 1 ].replace( /\\+/g, ' ' ) );\n    }\n  }\n\n  return '';\n}\n\nvar _gaq = _gaq || [];\n_gaq.push( [ '_setAccount', 'UA-1435314-2' ] );\nfunction _trackQuery( control, searcher, query )\n{\n  var gaQueryParamName = 'q';\n  var loc = document.location;\n  var url = [\n    loc.pathname,\n    loc.search,\n    loc.search ? '&' : '?',\n    gaQueryParamName == '' ? 'q' : encodeURIComponent( gaQueryParamName ),\n    '=',\n    encodeURIComponent( query )\n  ].join( '' );\n  _gaq.push( [ '_trackPageview', url ] );\n}\n\n</script><script src=\"https://www.google.com/uds/?file=search&amp;v=1&amp;hl=ja&amp;style=%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fcse%2Fstatic%2Fstyle%2Flook%2Fminimalist.css\" type=\"text/javascript\"></script><link href=\"https://www.google.com/uds/api/search/1.0/584853a42cc2f90f5533642697d97114/default+ja.css\" type=\"text/css\" rel=\"stylesheet\"><link href=\"//www.google.com/cse/static/style/look/minimalist.css\" type=\"text/css\" rel=\"stylesheet\"><script src=\"https://www.google.com/uds/api/search/1.0/584853a42cc2f90f5533642697d97114/default+ja.I.js\" type=\"text/javascript\"></script>\n\n<table cellspacing=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" class=\"gstl_50 gssb_c\" style=\"width: 100%; display: none; top: -1px; left: 0px; position: absolute;\"><tbody><tr><td class=\"gssb_f\"></td><td class=\"gssb_e\" style=\"width: 100%;\"></td></tr></tbody></table><div style=\"display: none; visibility: hidden;\">\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">var yahoo_ss_retargeting_id=1000048761,yahoo_sstag_custom_params=window.yahoo_sstag_params,yahoo_ss_retargeting=!0;</script>\n<script type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"//s.yimg.jp/images/listing/tool/cv/conversion.js\"></script></div><script type=\"text/javascript\" id=\"\">\"undefined\"!==typeof window.jQuery&&function(a){a(document).ready(function(){a(\"a\").filter(function(){return this.hostname&&this.hostname!==location.hostname}).click(function(){dataLayer.push({event:\"DefaultEvent\",eventCategory:\"ExternalLink\",eventAction:\"Clicked\",eventLabel:a(this).attr(\"href\"),eventValue:void 0})});a(document).click(function(a){a=event.target;\"flipdesk-trigger-hitarea\"==a.id?dataLayer.push({event:\"DefaultEvent\",eventCategory:\"Chat Event\",eventAction:\"Click\",eventLabel:void 0,eventValue:void 0}):\n\"flipdesk-target-form-buttontext\"==a.id&&dataLayer.push({event:\"DefaultEvent\",eventCategory:\"Chat Event\",eventAction:\"Send Message\",eventLabel:void 0,eventValue:void 0})})})}(jQuery);</script><div style=\"display: none; visibility: hidden;\"></div><div style=\"display: none; visibility: hidden;\"></div></body>"}
